walkthroughs.title: Welcome to Ledger Developer Tools
walkthroughs.description: Get started with building Ledger device apps.

steps.title: Check Prerequisites
steps.description:
$(docker-icon) **Docker**

Ensure you have Docker installed and running so the extension can spawn development environment containers from Ledger's [developer tools image](https://github.com/LedgerHQ/ledger-app-builder/).

[Get Docker](https://www.docker.com/)

$(git-icon) **Git**

Make sure Git is installed to allow the extension to clone Ledger app templates from Ledger's GitHub repositories.

[Get Git](https://git-scm.com/)

$(x11-icon) **X11 Server**

This extension requires an X11 display server to display the [Speculos](https://github.com/LedgerHQ/speculos) emulator. 
- Linux: Xorg or Wayland (via XWayland) is usually pre-installed. 
- macOS: Install [XQuartz](https://www.xquartz.org/). 
- Windows: Install [VcXsrv](https://sourceforge.net/projects/vcxsrv/).
**Configure your X11 server to allow connections from clients.**

steps.title: Learn more
steps.description:
Discover resources and documentation to help you get started with the development of Ledger device apps.
